page.title: 07A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: My name is Ian Mitchell and every day I get up at 7.15am and get dressed. At 7.35am I have breakfast and after that at 7.55 I get washed and clean my teeth. Soon after that I pack my bag and by 8.15 I am ready to go to school by bus. I leave home at 8.35 to catch Mr. Gantley's coach which leaves at 8.40. I arrive at school at 8.50 and set up a school computer. At 9.05 we have an assembly and at 9.30 we are usually ready to start our work. We have a playtime from 10.45 to 11.00 when we start work again until 12.05 when it is time to get ready for dinner. On Wednesday we have our dinner earlier because we go swimming. When I get home I do my homework and then watch television until 5.30 when dad gets home and we have our tea. I go to bed at 9.15pm.
